title: Subsystem Dependencies Declaration
description: Declares allowed imports for a subsystem. Everything not listed is forbidden.

allowed.description: Patterns for allowed imports specific to this subsystem.

allowedChildren.description: Dependencies that cascade to all child subsystems. Use for common framework deps like React, Next.js.

subsystems.description: Child subsystems of this subsystem (relative paths to folders with dependencies.json).

exceptions.description: Document WHY specific dependencies are needed (for human understanding)
